main event: A witness reported seeing a fiery object near the horizon that almost hit the ground.
interesting points: The sighting was reported on 21 Sept at 2008 MST.,The object was described as brighter than a meteor and had a long trail.,The object stopped in course during the observation.,The duration of the observation was 25 minutes.,The report concluded with insufficient data and no other reports of the incident.
sighted object: a fiery object in the sky
witness description: The witness described the object to Base Operations at Ellsworth AFB.
